title: American Hustle - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/7/18
itunes:title: American Hustle - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/7/18
description:
During an open lines program, guest host Ian Punnett talks to former investigator and author Tom McShane about his work on the art forgery case that inspired the movie "American Hustle."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
